title: Custom Resolution Support
author: Xechorizo
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->
May be related to #321.

Please add the ability to insert custom resolutions, or add a wider range of resolutions (eg 2560x1080).

Other solutions allow for this, and it would help make mRemoteNG more competitive. We're currently using mRemoteNG instead of others because "Redirect > Key Combinations" is available, but we trade this for custom resolutions in doing so.

comments.snippet: Apologies if this has been addressed already; I see MR-985 is closed as a duplicate of MR-938, which adds 1600x900. I'm unable to type a custom resolution in to Appearance > Resolution. Is there another way to set this, or a way to add custom entries to the dropdown menu? I can also pursue the subreddit, if best to do so there.
comments.author: Xechorizo

comments.snippet: Not a problem. This is not a duplicate. I was just closing out the old jira ticket.
comments.author: kmscode

comments.snippet: @kmscode Is it fixed? Do we have the ability to add custom resolution? We are looking for a 1900*1080 resolution. Please help!!
comments.author: asok-mirror
